Class AnimatedScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • thothbot.parallax.core.client.Animation
      • thothbot.parallax.core.client.AnimatedScene

  • public abstract class AnimatedScene
extends Animation
    The class to set up Scene for the WebGLRenderer in the Canvas3d context.

    thothbot
